r.d: PhD is a PHP based Docbook renderer aimed to replace Docbook-XSL and various other requirements needed to build the PHP.net documentation.
r.n: - Improved the performance of the indexer by ~ 75%. (Hannes) - Added --quit option to quit after processing command line params. Useful when used with --saveconfig to just save the config (Richard Quadling) - Output directory can now be nested (for example /rendering/PHP/en) (Richard Quadling) - New translations: - Spanish (Pablo Bangueses) - Serbian (Nikola Smolenski) - Fixed bug#52664 - "Missing" example#1. (Hannes) - Added --packagedir option to use external packages. (Moacir) - Added Format::getDebugTree() method to allow the current location in the tree to be reportable. (Richard Quadling)
